aka: Cemetery of Memory - Fragments of the Daily Life

cast.name: José Antonio Rodríguez José Antonio Rodríguez

this_title: Cemitério da Memória: Fragmentos da Vida Cotidiana
trans_title: 记忆的墓园：生活的片断
Cemetery of Memory - Fragments of the Daily Life
introduction: Cemetery memory is a short documentary on the history of the twentieth century. A record on the daily life of common people, not anonymous which lent their names to streets, squares or viaducts. Men and women who are not trampled on the moon, did not start wars, were not stars of cinema or TV, were not in newspaper headlines, do not discovered cure for any disease. People from simple life, with no glamor, but not really are devoid of beauty. Audible and visual fragments that were part of life for everyone, but that often went unnoticed.
chinese_title: 记忆的墓园：生活的片断
foreign_title: Cemitério da Memória: Fragmentos da Vida Cotidiana
